categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Hallan Krintu was a male Rutian Twi'lek Jedi. During his career, he was part of the Exploration Corps and eventually took Yigan Lam as a Padawan. They were present for Kaj Loomit's sabotage of a simulation chamber on Kamino during the Clone Wars. He carried a blue-bladed lightsaber and wore Jedi Commander armor.
Hawk appears in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying adventure Begun, The Clone Wars Have!, released in 2019.
